LightningComponentBundle.description: Lightning Component that shows an address on a map, given the correct address parameters within Lightning App Builder

property.name: recordName
property.label: Name Field API Name
property.description: The location title for the marker, displayed in the location list and in the info window when you click a marker.

property.name: recordDesc
property.label: Description Field API Name
property.description: The information displayed in the info window when you click a marker or location title.

property.name: iconColour
property.label: Icon Colour
property.description: The colour of the map icon within the margin. This field will take any Hex code or standard recognised CSS Colour (#ffa500). A blank field defaults to orange.
